name: Galactic Wars (Varun Nathani)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project named Galactic Wars. It's a 2D shooter game set in an outer space setting. The game has 5 levels with an increasing level of difficulty the last level being the Boss Fight. 
Modifications:
1) Changed Sprites of player and all enemies

2) Added 2 extra songs

3) Created 5 levels in total

4) Changed UI of the Main Menu screen

5) Created 3 new enemies ( General 1 &2 and Mothership)

6) Created animations for all new sprites

Credits: Designer/Developer - Varun Nathani

                   Music by: Rudra Panchal
